original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 328.50/65 to US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 328.50/65 to the US dollar on Wednesday, from 328.00/20 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.90/14.25 percent almost unchanged from 14.35/60 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 13.30/14.40 percent from 14.55/65 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 14.35/14.55 percent down from 14.55/65 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.45/14.65 percent from 14.65/75 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.30/14.55 percent, up from 14.35/60 percent. (Colombo/Nov22/2023)
